item.title: Installing VMware ESXi on an Internal USB?!
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.description:
One of the things I get the most questions about with my VMware ESXi posts/videos is about installing ESXi onto USB drives and booting it from there, and that question is usually followed by the concern of someone accidentally or even maliciously removing the drive from the chassis. In the case of the Dell PowerEdge […]

item.title: Dell PowerEdge R610 Review – Virtualization On The Cheap
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.description:
One of the things I always find myself telling anyone wanting to build out a home lab, is that it does not have to be expensive. The Dell PowerEdge R610 is a prime example of this and in this case I was able to pick up a matching pair of decently spec’d R610s that are […]

item.title: Installing and Configuring VMware vCenter 6.5 (VCSA)
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.description:
In this third and final part of my VMware series, I go over all of the basics of getting the VMware vCenter 6.5 Server Appliance up and running. Everything that I show in the video can be done with the evaluation version of vCenter, which gives you up to 2 months of time to play […]

item.title: Installing VMware vSphere ESXi 6.5
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.description:
In this video I go over all of the basics of getting up and running with my favorite hypervisor, VMware vSphere ESXi 6.5. Here is a quick run down of everything covered: Where to install ESXi, hard drive or USB drive? Creating a bootable USB drive with the VMware ESXi ISO image and Rufus Booting […]

item.title: How I cool my server rack!
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.description:
In this video I show my newest method of cooling my server rack, which so far has proved to work extremely well! I got this idea after seeing some video and pictures of newer data centers keeping the hot and cool air separate, then exhausting the hot air directly out. I thought why couldn’t I […]

The post How I cool my server rack! first appeared on RobWillis.info.

item.title: How to install VMware vSphere ESXi 6 (Video)
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.description:
In this video I demo how to install VMware vSphere ESXi 6 onto a Dell C2100 Server and I take you through everything from basic installation and configuration all the way up to connecting and managing the instance via the vSphere client. You will need the following at the very minimum to run ESXi 6: […]

item.title: What is ESXi? (Video)
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.description:
I often find myself talking about VMWare’s ESXi and how useful it can be in lab and production environments where you need to make the most of your hardware. For those who aren’t familiar with ESXi or virtualization in general, the first question usually is “What exactly is ESXi?”. The answer however isn’t exactly all […]

item.title: How to – Building Virtual Machines with VMWare ESXi 5.1…(Video)
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.description:
Virtual Machines in less than 5 minutes      That’s right, it takes less than 5 minutes to get a VM up and running in VMWare ESXi 5.1 via the VSphere console. Not only does this allow for fast provisioning of machines and whole environments but it also supports Windows, Linux and a myriad of other OSs. […]
